resources.string: Due to hardware and software diversity, it is not guarantee that this application will work on your device.\nPlease use it with caution!\nThank you!
The application should be restarted to be applied selected language.
Check this option to enable the service needed to keep screen locking.
Admin privileges are necessary to lock the device.
Wait for %.0f milliseconds to lock the screen. (1 second = 1000 milliseconds/msec, minimum is 50 msec, maximum is 3 sec)
Wait for %.0f second to lock the screen. (1 second = 1000 milliseconds/msec, minimum is 50 msec, maximum is 3 sec)
Wait for %.2f seconds to lock the screen. (1 second = 1000 milliseconds/msec, minimum is 50 msec, maximum is 3 sec)
Move the your hand over the proximity sensor to check the sensor state.\nCurrent recorded value is: %.2f
Use the light sensor value to verify if the phone is on the pocket.
Use the light sensor value to verify if the phone is on the pocket.\nCurrent light sensor value is: %.2f
Consider to be inside a pocket if the light sensor values are between 0 and %.2f.\nNote, sometime could be confused with a dark environment too.
Check to monitor the calls too.

By enabling this option, the application will monitor your phone state to lock your screen during calls too, incoming and outgoing. This can be usefully when are used bluetooth devices to make and answer to calls.
Check this option if you want to be screen locked for incoming calls only. For outgoing calls the screen will not be locked.
Monitor calls, but lock screen when an headphone or a bluetooth is connected to the device only.
Check the option to enable the screen lock notification when the screen is locked, this will allow the screen to be turned off when the screen is locked (prior unlocking the screen).
Set the notification to be always dismissible, by default is sticky on locked screen and can be dismissible during calls.
Touch this option to hide the notification if the notification remain on the status bar.
Create on your home screen a screen lock shortcut.
Remove from your home screen the screen lock shortcut

Touch this option to request for required application permissions: PROCESS OUTGOING CALLS and READ PHONE STATE (used to detect when an outgoing and incoming call are made), MODIFY AUDIO SETTINGS (used to check if an headset or a bluetooth is connected), RECEIVE BOOT COMPLETED (used to detect when booting process is finished).
Do you want to request for required application permissions?
This counter show you how many times your device was locked back by this application. Touch this option to see locked history and to reset the locked screen counter.
No screen lock history events recorded.
Define date time for list of screen lock history events.
Enabled admin privileges for Keep Screen Lock.
Disabling Keep Screen Lock admin privileges.
Disabled admin privileges for Keep Screen Lock.

Do you want to send a debugging report?\nYour default e-mail application will send an e-mail with two files attached, please fill a short description of your issues if is necessary.\nThank you!

Thank you for the appreciation of my work, buying pro application.

I made this application to avoid launching applications or made wrong calls when the phone is accidentally unlocked on pockets.
Unfortunately, I cannot guarantee its success, I still have issues too, but using this application I reduced the numbers of times when the phone screen was accidentally activated into the pocket.

Be very carefully and do experiments when you modify any of application options!
